title: Cancellation and threats over pro-Israel event

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any records reflecting or concerning the HaYovel event scheduled to be held at the Sonesta Nashville Airport hotel in May 2024, including (but not limited to) any communications with the hosts or organizers of the event.

2. Any incident reports or other records concerning any threat concerning the HaYovel event.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Adam Steinbaugh.

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide the below records for the Omohundro WTP Upgrade/Expansion CMAR project.  

Requested Documents: 
1. All RFP Responses from Contractors 
2. All RFP Responses for Designers 
3. Executed Preconstruction Phase Contract for Contractor 
4. Executed Design Phase Contract for Design Team 
5. Executed Construction Phase Contracts 
6. Initial Application for Payment for the Construction Phase of the Project along with supporting back-up documentation 
7. Most Recent Application for Payment for the Construction Phase of the Project along with supporting back-up documentation 8. Most Recent Contractor Construction Schedule
8. Most Recent Contractor Construction Schedule

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Bob Smith.
